seo.title: Flux.2 Pro - 4MP Native Resolution & Multi-Reference AI | z-image.app
seo.description: Generate professional 4MP images with Flux.2 Pro. Features advanced multi-reference character consistency, perfect typography, and photorealistic lighting. The ultimate tool for commercial design.

structuredData.name: Flux.2 Pro
structuredData.description: The flagship AI image generation model by Black Forest Labs, featuring 4 megapixel native resolution, multi-image reference support for consistency, and superior text rendering.

hero.title: Flux.2 Pro: 4MP Resolution & Perfect Consistency
hero.tagline: Create stunning ultra-high-resolution images with the new Multi-Reference engine. Maintain character identity across shots and render flawless text in a single pass.

imageGallery.title: Flux.2 Pro: Ultra-High Resolution Portfolio
imageGallery.description: Experience commercial-grade quality. View native 4MP images showcasing consistent characters, complex typography, and print-ready advertising visuals.

how_to.title: Master Professional Generation with Flux.2 Pro
how_to.description: Leverage the advanced API capabilities for commercial-grade results.

steps.title: 1. Select Flux.2 Pro
steps.description: Choose 'Flux.2 Pro' from the model list to access the high-vram 32B parameter backend.

media.alt: Selecting Flux.2 Pro from the model dropdown.

steps.title: 2. Upload References (Optional)
steps.description: Upload up to 10 reference images. Flux.2 Pro uses these to maintain consistent character faces, product details, or artistic styles across your generation.

media.alt: User uploading 3 reference photos of a model to ensure facial consistency.

steps.title: 3. Generate in 4MP
steps.description: Click generate. The model processes the image at a native 4 megapixel resolution, delivering print-ready crispness without needing an upscaler.

media.alt: Zooming into a high-resolution eye detail in the generated result.

useCases.title: Where Flux.2 Pro Excels
useCases.description: Designed for commercial workflows where 'good enough' isn't enough.

scenarios.tagline: Skip the upscaler. Generate print-ready native 4K.
scenarios.description: Advertising agencies use Flux.2 Pro to generate 4-megapixel assets directly. The native high resolution means skin textures and product labels remain sharp even when printed on large formats, eliminating the artifacts common with AI upscaling tools.

image.alt: A high-fashion perfume advertisement generated with perfect text and texture.

scenarios.tagline: The same face, every single panel.
scenarios.description: Using the Multi-Reference capability, comic artists upload a character sheet and generate dozens of panels. Flux.2 Pro understands the subject's structure, ensuring the protagonist looks identical in a coffee shop scene and a space battle.

image.alt: A comic strip showing the exact same character in three different emotional states.

scenarios.description: E-commerce brands upload a reference photo of their bottle or box. Flux.2 Pro places it into complex lifestyle environments—on a rainy table, in a sunlit kitchen—respecting the product's logo and dimensions perfectly.

image.alt: A specific brand of soda can placed seamlessly into a chaotic cyberpunk party scene.

scenarios.description: Designers generate full website landing page concepts. Unlike older models that produced scribbles, Flux.2 Pro renders the headlines and button text ('Sign Up', 'Learn More') legibly, speeding up the wireframing process.

image.alt: A futuristic mobile app interface with clear, readable English text.

features.title: The Power of Flux.2 Pro
features.description: Black Forest Labs' most advanced closed-source model, tuned for maximum fidelity.

items.title: 4 Megapixel Native Output
items.description: Generate images at resolutions up to 2048x2048 (or equivalent aspect ratios) natively. Capture microscopic details in skin, fabric, and nature that smaller models blur out.

items.title: Multi-Reference Injection
items.description: Upload up to 10 reference images to guide the generation. The model blends these inputs intelligently, allowing for style transfer or rigid character consistency.

items.title: Typography Mastery
items.description: From neon signs to handwritten notes, Flux.2 Pro renders text with near-human accuracy. It handles long phrases and complex font styles without 'hallucinating' letters.

items.title: Physically Based Lighting
items.description: The updated transformer architecture simulates light transport more accurately, resulting in reflections, refractions, and shadows that ground objects in reality.

items.title: Complex Prompt Adherence
items.description: Flux.2 Pro follows dense, multi-sentence instructions without forgetting elements. If you ask for 'a red cat on a blue chair next to a green lamp', you get exactly that.

items.title: Commercial License
items.description: Built for enterprise use. Images generated via Flux.2 Pro on z-image.app come with full commercial rights, safe for use in global marketing campaigns.

items.question: What is the difference between Flux.2 Pro and the original Flux.1?
items.answer: Flux.2 Pro introduces native 4MP resolution (4x higher than Flux.1), the new Multi-Reference feature for character consistency, and significantly improved text rendering capabilities.

items.question: Does Flux.2 Pro support Image-to-Image consistency?
items.answer: Yes. With the new Multi-Reference support, you can upload existing images to guide the identity or style of the new generation, making it the best tool for storytelling and branding.

items.question: Why does Flux.2 Pro cost more credits?
items.answer: Flux.2 Pro runs on a massive 32-billion parameter architecture and generates at a much higher resolution (4MP). This requires significantly more GPU compute power per image than standard models.

items.question: Can I use Flux.2 Pro for text-heavy designs?
items.answer: Absolutely. It is currently one of the best models on the market for typography. It can render logos, headlines, and book covers with correct spelling and varied font styles.

items.question: Is the 'Multi-Reference' feature like training a LoRA?
items.answer: It serves a similar purpose (consistency) but happens instantly without training. You simply upload the images at runtime, and the model 'learns' the subject for that specific generation.

items.question: What acts as the best prompt for Flux.2 Pro?
items.answer: Natural language works best. Be descriptive about lighting, texture, and composition. For text, ensure you place the words you want rendered inside quotation marks.

items.question: How fast is Flux.2 Pro?
items.answer: Despite its high resolution, Flux.2 Pro is optimized for speed, typically generating a 4MP image in under 10 seconds on our enterprise GPU cluster.

items.question: Can I hide the reference images I upload?
items.answer: Yes, your uploads are private to your session and are automatically deleted from our servers after processing, ensuring your IP remains secure.

cta.title: Upgrade to Professional Resolution
cta.description: Stop struggling with blurry upscales and inconsistent characters. Switch to Flux.2 Pro for 4MP native quality.
